pages.text: The $(item)Quarry$() uses Zaps to mine an area.$(br2)Mined items will be collected into the Quarry's inventory.$(br2)You can install $(item)Overclocker Upgrades$() to make it work faster.
It costs a little over 150âš¡ to mine each block.
By default, the Quarry only mines a 7x7 area. You can increase this using $(item)Landmarks$().$(br2)Place up to 3 Landmarks to set the boundary, and place the Quarry so it's inline with all of them.
